title: Application of Machine Learning and Evolutionary Algorithms for Soft Self-Responding Material Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations in continuum mechanics, finite element analysis (FEA) experience, Python programming proficiency, and understanding of linear algebra and optimization theory
context.additional_context: Practical skill-focused education utilizing physics-based simulations in VR environments

learning_goals: Implement and validate an FCNN model to predict nonlinear deformation of soft materials under six-directional magnetic field conditions
Optimize inverse design solutions for magnetization profiles corresponding to target deformations using evolutionary algorithms
Develop a design process that improves data efficiency by 75% through symmetry constraint application
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
